Detailed Description

Ifactory is the base abstract class design to manage in the same way all template classes factory<t>.

Member Data Documentation

◆ m_pHead

Ifactory * eternity::Ifactory::m_pHead = 0
static

The fist object in global factory<t> list.

All instancied factory<t> are collect inside an unique global list. m_pHead is the head of that list.

Definition at line 40 of file dynamic.hpp.

◆ m_pNext

Ifactory* eternity::Ifactory::m_pNext

The next item in global factory<t> list.

Each item in the gloabl list of factory<t> object has a pointer to the next item named m_pNext. The last element has a NULL value inside m_pNext.
